description: This file is the main HTML page for a web-based database visualizer application. It contains the structure and styling for the user interface, including sidebar for database selection, table view area, and associated scripts for fetching and displaying database information and table data dynamically.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by reloading databases and resetting UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database's table list in the sidebar.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs HTML for displaying table data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Returns HTML for individual cell content, with expandability for long or object data.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content to show full or truncated data.
